attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British jobs for British workers.. British workers should be able to apply for any vacancies that arrive in the job market and should be considered first if they have the skills or able to do the training

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
